content: तमं {@--1@} Darkness. {@--2@} The tip of the foot. --मः {@--1@} An epithet of Rāhu. {@--2@} The Tamāla tree. {@--3@} Darkness.

तम A Taddhita affix of the superlative degree applied to nouns, adjectives, and also to verbs and indeclinables in which latter case it is changed to तमाम्; अश्व° <ls>Pt. 5.</ls> ‘the best horse’; सुहृत्तम <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; so पचतितमाम्. It is also added to pronouns in the sense of ‘one of many’; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} कतम, यतम, ततम &c.
